UserNotConfirmedException: Please finish the confirmation step when signing up
PasswordResetRequiredException: An error occurred. Please contact the administrator
CodeMismatchException: Invalid verification code provided, please try again.
VerificationCodeSent: Please enter a verification code we sent to your email address.
InvalidParameterException: Password must have length greater than or equal to 6.
UsernameExistsException: An account with the given email already exists.
CodeResentSuccessfully: Verification code has been resent to your email.
